title: Full Stack HelpDesk Application
description: The application is a full-stack Helpdesk app that leverages Java Spring Boot for the backend and ReactJS ( Vite ) for the frontend. The app includes features such as user authentication, which allows users to create accounts and log in to access personalized features. The backend manages the data persistence with a database system, handling CRUD operations for movie data, user profiles, and user-specific data...

title: Full-Stack Cinama Web Application
description: The application is a full-stack movie app that leverages NestJS for the backend and NextJS for the frontend. The app includes features such as user authentication, which allows users to create accounts and log in to access personalized features like favorite lists and watch later queues. The backend manages the data persistence with a database system, handling CRUD operations for movie data, user profiles, and user-specific data....
